text: The film, which stars Amandla Stenberg, hits theaters in October. 20th Century Fox on Sunday released the first trailer for its upcoming adaptation of Angie Thomas'best - selling book The Hate U Give, starring Amandla Stenberg. In the film, Stenberg plays Starr Carter, a teen who is constantly switching between two worlds : the poor, mostly black neighborhood where she lives, and the rich, mostly white prep school she attends. The uneasy balance between these worlds is shattered when Starr witnesses the fatal shooting of her childhood best friend Khalil at the hands of a police officer. Now, facing pressures from all sides of the community, Starr must find her voice and stand up for what's right.
